scripts.validatePublishReadiness: git diff --exit-code && cd ./pub && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && npm install && cd .. && npm run test
scripts.pubMin: npm run validatePublishReadiness && cd ./pub && npm version minor --packageFile ./pub && git push && npm publish --packageFile ./pub
scripts.pubPatch: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm version patch --packageFile ./pub && git push && npm publish --packageFile ./pub
scripts.update2latest: cd ./pub && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && nsi && cd ../test && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && nsi
scripts.updateAndCommit: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm run update2latest && npm run test && git commit -am "u2l"
scripts.update2latestAndPublishMinor: npm run updateAndCommit && npm run pubMin
scripts.update2latestAndPublishPath: npm run updateAndCommit && npm run pubPatch
